author: cnbc.com
title: IDACORP, Inc. Declares Dividend
text:
BOISE, Idaho, April 19, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- Directors of IDACORP, Inc. (NYSE:IDA) today declared a common stock dividend of $0.59 per share, payable May 30, 2018 to holders of record at the close of business on May 7, 2018.
View original content with multimedia: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/idacorp-inc-declares-dividend-300633417.html
SOURCE IDACORP, Inc.
